Package com.intellij.openapi.vcs.history

Interface VcsHistoryProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    VcsHistoryProviderEx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CvsHistoryProvider, GitHistoryProvider, HgHistoryProvider, SvnHistoryProvider

    public interface VcsHistoryProvider

    • Method Detail

      • getUICustomization

        VcsDependentHistoryComponents getUICustomization(VcsHistorySession session,
                                                 javax.swing.JComponent forShortcutRegistration)

      • getAdditionalActions

        AnAction[] getAdditionalActions(java.lang.Runnable refresher)

      • isDateOmittable

        boolean isDateOmittable()
        Returns whether the history provider submits the custom-formatted date and the standard "Date" column must be omitted to get rid of confusion.
        Returns:
        true if history provider submits the custom-formatted date.

      • getHelpId

        java.lang.String getHelpId()

      • createSessionFor

        VcsHistorySession createSessionFor(FilePath filePath)
                            throws VcsException
        Returns the history session for the specified file path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file path for which the session is requested.
        Returns:
        the session, or null if the initial revisions loading process was cancelled.
        Throws:
        VcsException - if an error occurred when loading the revisions

      • reportAppendableHistory

        void reportAppendableHistory(FilePath path,
                             VcsAppendableHistorySessionPartner partner)
                      throws VcsException
        Throws:
        VcsException

      • supportsHistoryForDirectories

        boolean supportsHistoryForDirectories()

      • getHistoryDiffHandler

        DiffFromHistoryHandler getHistoryDiffHandler()
        The returned DiffFromHistoryHandler will be called, when user calls "Show Diff" from the file history panel. If null is returned, the standard handler will be used, which is suitable for most cases.

      • canShowHistoryFor

        boolean canShowHistoryFor(VirtualFile file)
        Provide any additional restrictions for showing history for the given file. Basic restrictions are checked in the TabbedShowHistoryAction.
        Parameters:
        file - File which history is requested or may be requested.
        Returns:
        true if the VCS can show history for this file.
